name: @ikerin/directus-typegen-cli
description: CLI tool for generating Directus SDK TypeScript types

scripts.is-already-published: npm view @ikerin/directus-typegen-cli versions --json | jq --exit-status 'any(. == $current)' --arg current $(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')
scripts.publish: if [ $(bun run is-already-published) == true ]; then echo 'Already published'; else npm publish --access public --provenance; fi
